## Description {#details}

An input file.

This is a symbol table wrapper that only exposes the information that an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lto/lto">LTO</a> client should need in order to do symbol resolution.

Definition at line 115 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/lto-h">LTO.h</a>.
